page.title: 06Education
page.content: Clovelly County Primary School has 34 children, from 5-11 years. There are two full- time{teachers.} Most local children attend the school, which is in Wrinkleberry Lane. They enjoy a broad curriculum. There are sessions with other schools and many educational visits. At 11 + most children go to the{Comprehensive {school}in Bideford. Others go to schools like Grenville College or the Convent in Bideford ,or the Small School at Hartland. At 16+ some become students at N.Devon College at Barnstaple. There is 1 Clovelly student at{University.}Occasional evening classes are held. There is a pre-school{playgroup}which meets in the Village Hall. Villagers and the school enjoy the amenity of a travelling{library.
